data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Well, based on my observation, overcrowding in schools only happens in big cities, and I guess the primary cause of this phenomenon is the massive influx of rural migrants who flock to cities in search of better education opportunities. To stem the tide of rural depopulation, I believe that we must first address its root causes. At the heart of the matter is the disparity between services and facilities in the country and those in the city. I believe that urban and rural dwellers alike would find the idea of country life far more appealing, if high quality libraries and schools were more readily available in the country. One further method of attracting people to the country would be for the government to provide financial incentives to professional teachers and trainers who willingly relocate to rural areas. (137 字)
data.referenceText: What leads to overcrowding in places like prisons or schools? What can be done about it?
data.referenceTranslate: 是什么导致监狱或学校等地方过于拥挤? 对此我们能做些什么呢?
